name: Jennifer Hector
text: When our order is $50 and ordered frequently/routinely, I think if we ask to pay for (and do) an extra mushroom large pizza, we should see more than one mushroom per slice.  Otherwise, we are pretty much eating a cheese pizza. We ordered ‚Ä¶More

name: Joe Wakar
text: Food came quick, online ordering worked well. Employees were prompt if a little unfriendly. Always love the crust, pizza was good quality. What's the deal with such an offensive yellow all over the interior? There is no contrast with that ‚Ä¶More

name: Miguel Rodriguez
text: A mistake on an order led to one of the best customer service examples I have ever seen. I have worked in customer service for over 35 years, and I was so impressed with how we were treated , that the delicious meal was actually second to the the service. Keep up the amazing work!

name: Elizabeth Veres
text: Ordered online for a 11:20am pick up.  Store "opened" at 11am.  Got there, front door was locked.  Called multiple times and nobody picked up even though when I pulled in an employee was sitting in a parking spot smoking.  Ordered online ‚Ä¶More

name: Nat Quick
text: Good place never seem to have a problem and I visit often, pizza is always cooked right.

name: Devin Nash
text:
Ordered a pizza and they coudnt find my address when I can look it up in Google maps easy.
Then I tried to call them back several times while they were open and got no answer. Last time I ever get hungry Howies

name: Heather Brooks
text: I've almost always had near perfect service and food from Hungry Howie's. Amazing crust, bread, and toppings.

name: Rebecca Rook
text:
Positives:
The person answering the phone was polite.
The delivery driver was very pleasant. ‚Ä¶More

Good pizza

text: I ordered tonight and Got Hunter as my delivery driver. He‚Äôs delivered to me for about 2 years now and on everything he is the most amazing person ever. I literally had to call them after my order and up his tip from 7 to 10. He deserves ‚Ä¶More

text: In my opinion.. the best hungry Howie's in Lansing.. very courteous staff and have never had a problem with my food.

text: Delivery was quick! Food was yummy and fair priced!

text: Love your pizza!

name: Jon Senter
text: Really good pizza. Their staff is nice too.

name: Kathy Mckee
text: These guys are great I love the cross they always get the garlic crust they have great deals especially if you not a big eater they had small with 2 items for $5 I get that every time and I have some left over for the next day great pizza good deals

name: Ross B
text: Only ordered from them once and the order was wrong. Delivery guy was nice but won‚Äôt order again.

name: Sir Anthony Corwin
text: It's really incomparable.  Service is always ahead of schedule, food is always good. Price is Right and the rewards club is pretty neat.

name: Jacob Schlaud
text: I ordered a pizza tonight and after an hr I called to check on the progress. The lady immediately cut me off and told me that my order will get their when it gets there. I called back and she hung up on me. I will NEVER order from this place again. This was the worst customer service I have encountered.......

name: Christopher Robinson
text: Thats a no for me dog

text: Really love this pizza and their staff.  The problem is our order is has been wrong 3 out of the last 9 times- and that's only after I started to keep track because of previous orders being wrong. ‚Ä¶More

text: This place is great. The pizza is always delicious whether I'm picking it up or it's being delivered. The delivery is quick and the staff is friendly. Hands down my favorite pizza place.

text: Decent pie, ready quickly

text: Worst hungry howies ever!  They deliver wrong order and don't want to ever make it right yet you get charged for what you didn't order!  Will NOT be returning to this location

name: Phillip Rosas
text: Flavored Asiago Cheese Crust,as if!Where was it?I cant taste any of it!Plus it taste like bland little caesars crust!And where are your toppings?There are barely any toppings on this pizza!

name: Tara Gardner
text: I love this hungry howies. They actually put stuff on the pizza. Most of them don't. In all the ones in lansing this is the one to go to. They make the best pizza. I specifically buy the howie rolls and they are the best at this location.

name: Ryan Watkins
text: Tried to order food from 3.1 miles down the same road they are located on, but the manager had relayed a message that they wouldn't deliver to me. I understand there is a closer one, but it closes early and I expected one right down the ‚Ä¶More

text: Crammed space but cheap pizza and decent quality for the price. I recommend the deep dish

name: Cameron Smith
text: Great place to order from. The delivery driver, hunter, was able to deliver my order much sooner than estimated. Way faster than Patrick.

name: Aura Indico
text: Nice, prompt service and genuinely delicious pizza, but the generally higher price per Pizza makes Hungry Howie's only an occasional Indulgence. This particular location's small waiting area is just a tad claustrophobic.

name: Hunter Emery
text: Speedy drivers and always friendly. Cameron was very professional and deeply cared about my inputs
